overview: In young Kaleb's world, there is his undocumented mother Betty, his surrogate big brother Mehdi, and especially Jean-Luc, the lonely tailor who has taken a liking to this little boy. In the crowd of anonymous people in Paris, they should never have crossed paths. But fate has brought them together to form an improvised family, bound by the mission to build a future for Kaleb.
title: Le monde de Kaleb
